channel.title: Question on server sorces!
channel.description:
Im just now learning about the whole sever sorce download and how to make server. So i need to know if i dwonload a server sorce can i dwonlaod anouther. Like if i have 1 sorce and i dwonload anouther could i use them both?
\~RS_Prodigy~/

item.title: Question on server sorces!
item.dc:creator: @Deviation_Scape Deviation Scape
item.description:
@Deviation_Scape wrote:

To change the port, open your server folder and then open server.java. Search for whatever your port is and change it to whatever you want it to be.

Read full topic

item.title: Question on server sorces!
item.dc:creator: @Newb_2341 Newb 2341
item.description:
@Newb_2341 wrote:

There is no limit to how many sources you can take (why would there be…), but there IS a limit to your RAM and CPU of your computer.

You could use them both. You’d just have to have seperate ports (like 43594 and 5555), and portforward both.

Read full topic
